mapper.insert: insert into t_customer(username, mobile, pwd, code, `desc`, demand, address, design_id,cus_reserve1,cus_reserve2) VALUES (#{username},#{mobile},#{pwd},#{code},#{desc},#{demand},#{address},#{design.id},#{cusReserve1},#{cusReserve2})
mapper.select: select customer.*, user.id as uid,user.username as uname,user.mobile as umobile, house.house_id,house.house_name,house.house_address, houseType.type_id,houseType.type_name, solutions.solu_id,solutions.solu_name,solutions.state,solutions.solu_desc,solutions.add_time,solutions.share_sign from t_customer customer left join t_user user on customer.design_id=user.id left join t_house house on house.customer_id=customer.id left join t_solutions solutions on house.house_id = solutions.house_id left join t_house_type houseType on house.type_id = houseType.type_id where customer.id=#{id}
